news: Alpha version. Can create cat. Cat can live. Fixed creating form and some animation bugs.
Planed features to the future. Cat can eat and die. Added toilet with clean and getShit methods. Cat can poop.
Added carousel. Now can choose cat from the carousel.
Fixed bug with an audio and a gif. Added feature when toilet is using, then show gif with a dig animation, while audio is playing. Added button What is new?
Added multi cat mode. Now you can create 4 cats maximum. Added feed and pet actions.
Now if cats' box is full, cats poop on the carpet. Flat becomes dirty and smell. You can open/close window to air the room, also you can clean toilet and carpet.
Added sounds on the owner and the cats actions.
Now you can start the game on mobile phones and tablets.
